description: AID 2026 AI & DeFi Summit Official Side Event of Consensus Hong Kong 2026 As Artificial Intelligence redefines the boundaries of efficiency, Decentralized Finance (DeFi) provides the transparent settlement layer essential for autonomous operations. As a global leader in decentralized AI computing and DeFi yield engines, AID cordially invites you to the 2026 AI & DeFi Summit a premier side event during Consensus Hong Kong 2026. This exclusive 4-hour gathering brings together elite projects, visionary builders, and top-tier VCs across the AI and DeFi sectors to explore how autonomous intelligence and decentralized liquidity will shape the next era of financial infrastructure. Expect high-impact keynotes, strategic discussions, hands-on workshops, immersive experiences, and curated networking with industry leaders driving the future of AI-native finance. Agenda 18:30 19:00 Check-in & Reception 19:00 19:08 AID Keynote 19:08 19:28 Sponsored Keynotes (open for enrollment) 19:28 20:00 Panel Discussion 2026: Bridging AI Autonomy and DeFi Liquidity 20:00 21:00 Workshop Magic Performance Networking 21:00 22:00 Games & Airdrop Important Notes For Sponsors: RSVP by February 1, 2026 For Participants: Space is extremely limited. RSVP via QR code is required. If you do not receive a confirmation, we regret that we will not be able to accommodate you this time. Attendance is first-come, first-served Premium canap and cocktails will be served Panel GUEST Frank IOSG...
